input.sentences: the family took a trip to the zoo .
the first think they did was give the boy a ride on a camel .
after that | they got to see the flamingos .
they also got to see a bear .
the habitat showed several bears interacting together .
output.sentences: When we were visiting Nebraska, my family went to Henry Doorly Zoo.
One of the fun things we got to do there was ride a camel.
The zoo has one of the largest aviaries in the world and features a large flock of flamingoes.
One of the scariest animals at the zoo was a huge grizzly bear.
The bear was in a compound with other bears and they had lots of room to play or lay on the rocks and sleep.
